Name: Elderflower Spritz
Instructions: POUR wine and then elderflower liqueur into an ice-filled glass. TOP with soda (or champagne).
History: Created in 2006 by yours truly ahead of the launch of St-Germain elderflower liqueur . It went on to become the brand's signature cocktail. See: Spritz cocktail history
Nutrition: One serving of Elderflower Spritz contains 159 calories
